titles.title: Appalachian Development Highway System Completion Act of 2009
A bill to complete construction of the 13-States Appalachian development highway system, and for other purposes.
Appalachian Development Highway System Completion Act of 2009

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

bill.summary:
Appalachian Development Highway System Completion Act of 2009 - Authorizes appropriations out of the Highway Trust Fund (other than the Mass Transit Account) for FY2010-FY2015 for the Appalachian development highway system program. Directs the Secretary of Transportation to apportion such funds among the appropriate states to complete construction of the Appalachian development highway system.
Authorizes states of the system to loan apportioned amounts between themselves.
